markdownRemark.html:
How To Use

Video demonstrates how to use Blocktag's Do-It-Yourself (DIY) system for authentication tags.

Process:

  1. Generate downloadable tag.
  2. Print tag
  3. Fingerprint printed tag
  4. Authenticate original fingerprinted tag.
  5. Scan and reprint original tag
  6. Authenticate reprinted tag

ChunMing Chin
Cofounder, Director of Engineering
Blocktag Inc
